entry.title: 用hexo框架搭建静态博客
entry.content:
【Hexo 静态博客框架』是一个纯静态的博客网站框架，也就是一款基于 Node.js 的静态博客框架，依赖少、易于安装使用，可以方便的生成静态网页托管在服务器上，并且Hexo 使用 Markdown（或其他渲染引擎）解析文章，在几秒内，即可利用靓丽的主题生成静态网页。

这套软件官网：https://hexo.io/zh-cn/index.html

Hexo博客的开发与部署流程
接下来简单阐述一下一个之前从未接触过Hexo的折腾党是如何搭建并部署的：

1)安装hexo软件所有操作命令

# 所有操作步骤npm install hexo-cli -ghexo init blogcd blognpm installhexo server

2)部署hexo软件操作日志

# 软件安装[root@web mnt]# npm install hexo-cli -gnpm WARN deprecated mkdirp@0.5.4: Legacy versions of mkdirp are no longer supported. Please update to mkdirp 1.x. (Note that the API surface has changed to use Promises in 1.x.)/usr/local/node-v12.16.1-linux-arm64/bin/hexo -> /usr/local/node-v12.16.1-linux-arm64/lib/node_modules/hexo-cli/bin/hexonpm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: fsevents@~2.1.2 (node_modules/hexo-cli/node_modules/chokidar/node_modules/fsevents):npm WARN notsup SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Unsupported platform for fsevents@2.1.2: wanted {"os":"darwin","arch":"any"} (current: {"os":"linux","arch":"arm64"})+ hexo-cli@3.1.0updated 1 package in 30.447s# 创建一个hexo软链接，因为下面要用hexo命令[root@web mnt]# ln -s /usr/local/node-v12.16.1-linux-arm64/bin/hexo /usr/local/bin/hexo[root@web mnt]# hexo -Vhexo-cli: 3.1.0os: Linux 4.18.0-147.0.3.el7.aarch64 linux arm64node: 12.16.1v8: 7.8.279.23-node.31uv: 1.34.0zlib: 1.2.11brotli: 1.0.7ares: 1.15.0modules: 72nghttp2: 1.40.0napi: 5llhttp: 2.0.4http_parser: 2.9.3openssl: 1.1.1dcldr: 35.1icu: 64.2tz: 2019cunicode: 12.1[root@web mnt]# # 初始化博客[root@web mnt]# hexo init blogINFO  Cloning hexo-starter https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-starter.gitCloning into '/mnt/blog'...remote: Enumerating objects: 30, done.remote: Counting objects: 100% (30/30), done.remote: Compressing objects: 100% (24/24), done.remote: Total 161 (delta 12), reused 12 (delta 4), pack-reused 131Receiving objects: 100% (161/161), 31.79 KiB | 6.00 KiB/s, done.Resolving deltas: 100% (74/74), done.Submodule 'themes/landscape' (https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-theme-landscape.git) registered for path 'themes/landscape'Cloning into 'themes/landscape'...remote: Enumerating objects: 1063, done.remote: Total 1063 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 1063Receiving objects: 100% (1063/1063), 3.21 MiB | 9.00 KiB/s, done.Resolving deltas: 100% (585/585), done.Submodule path 'themes/landscape': checked out '73a23c51f8487cfcd7c6deec96ccc7543960d350'INFO  Install dependenciesnpm WARN deprecated mkdirp@0.5.4: Legacy versions of mkdirp are no longer supported. 安装RSS插件，网友可订阅：npm install hexo-generator-feed --save# 启用插件(在hexo\_config.yml文件添加插件配置项：)：#RSS订阅plugin:- hexo-generator-feed#Feed Atomfeed:  type: atom  path: atom.xml  limit: 20

EulerOS系统部署hexo过程中出错（还未解决）：

3)用hexo写日志

# 生成一个页面-自动生成页面路径和标题[root@web blog]# hexo new "post title with kunpeng"# 带路径，手工指定路径kunpeng01[root@web blog]# hexo new --path kunpneg01 "post title with kunpeng"INFO  Created: /mnt/blog/source/_posts/kunpneg01.md# 关于我[root@web blog]# hexo new page --path about/index "About me"INFO  Created: /mnt/blog/source/about/index.md

4)安装自定义主题

hexo主题页面：https://hexo.io/themes/

# 安装landscape-plus主题[root@web blog]# git clone https://github.com/xiangming/landscape-plus.git themes/landscape-plus[root@web ~]# vim /mnt/blog/_config.yml change this:theme: landscapeto this:theme: landscape-plu

5)部署静态页面到nginx

软件安装完成了，静态页面也生成了，肯定要使用世界上最牛的nginx来跑咱的博客系统了。

# 编辑nginx配置文件，指向我们新生成的目录[root@web ~]# vim /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.confchange this:        location / {            root   root;            index  index.html index.htm;        }to this:        location / {            root   /mnt/blog/public;            index  index.html index.htm;        }# 也可以根据需要适当修改其他配置参数。# 重新启动nginx[root@web ~]# systemctl restart nginx.service

系统部署成功，也可以打开浏览器访问
http://your_ip
或者：
http://www.xxx.com

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
